CONJUGATES: gears (n. pl.) | gears (v. 3rd sing.) | geared (v. past/p.p.) | gearing (v. pres. p.)
ETYMOLOGY: From Old Norse gervi 'equipment, apparel', or from a Germanic root meaning 'to make ready, prepare'. Related to Old English gearwe 'equipment' and Old High German garawen 'to prepare'.
SINCE: Late Middle English (c. 13th-14th century for equipment; 16th century for machinery sense)

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A set of toothed wheels, or a single toothed wheel, that meshes with others to transmit power or change the speed or direction of motion, especially in a vehicle or bicycle.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 传动装置；齿轮；排挡 (指汽车、自行车等的)
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The car wouldn't go into reverse gear, so I had to push it.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这辆车挂不上倒挡，所以我不得不推它。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Equipment, clothing, or other articles needed for a particular activity or purpose.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: (进行某活动所需的)用具；设备；衣服；行头
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: We need to pack all our camping gear before we leave for the mountains.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 在我们动身去山区之前，我们需要打包好我们所有的露营装备。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Verb: a word or phrase that describes an action, condition, or experience. Transitive verbs (vtr) take a direct object. Adverb (adv) modifies a verb. Preposition (prep) links a noun or pronoun to another word.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To prepare oneself or something for a particular purpose, situation, or increased activity.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The company is gearing up for a major product launch next month.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 公司正为下个月的大型产品发布做准备。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: Illegal drugs, especially heroin or amphetamines.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: (俚语)毒品，尤指海洛因或安非他命
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He was caught with some gear and taken into custody.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他被查出携带毒品并被拘留。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Verb: a word or phrase that describes an action, condition, or experience. Transitive verbs (vtr) take a direct object.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: To provide (a mechanism or vehicle) with a specific type of gear or gearing.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 为…安装齿轮；用齿轮传动
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The racing bicycle was specially geared for high speeds on flat terrain.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这辆赛车特别安装了适合平坦地形高速行驶的齿轮传动系统。
